author: Electricks94
body:
This PR moves the MultiVectorManager to DataFormats/Common and addresses the following issues that come from a discussion in #48826

1. Rename to MultiSpan and move to edm namespace
2. Rename `addVector` method to `add`
3. Ensure const-correctness
5. Implementation of Random Access Iterator that respects const-correctness
6. Apply cms naming convention 
7. Implementation of a test case
8. Add documentation


FYI @felicepantaleo @waredjeb
title: Move MultiVectorManager to DataFormats/Common and address discussion from #48826 and rename it to MultiSpan
